TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You are now named Jeb, and Nasa uses you for craft testing, since you are like Jebediah Kerman.

I wish for pancakes!

Granted! Theyre disgusting. Way to go!

I wish i had the best cookies on the world.

Granted. Those are space cookies. Before you can stop her, your mom eats a couple, congratulating you on their awesome taste. She leaves for a nice evening out with her friends. You still have a dozen cookies left, though. So you have that going for you, which is nice.

I wish I had a couple of cziken20's cookies - without having to become his/her mom.

Edited July 26, 2015 by heng

Granted. cziken20 only lets you have one quarter of a cookie.

I wish to be a usb drive.

granted,but you re infected

I wish i had a lot of cakes

Granted, the cakes are a lie ;D

I wish for the ability to lie without anyone noticing.

granted, people also dont notice you exist

I wish i had a mini GLaDOS without neurotoxin

Granted. But Weathley take over the center and make everything explode by accident.

I wish I wasn't procrastinating enough to create a post in the forum games

Granted. when you finally make one, it's a long, great game. Your computer runs out of power

I wish i had a piece of bread.

Granted. The piece is thinner than one atom so it doesnt actually exist!

I wish i had super skills in Osu.

Granted. You don't have super skills in stopping gunfire from jealous people.

I wish I could read standard times.

Granted. But by the time you can do that the humanity switch to even more complicated times and the knowledge you built on today's standar time is no longer relevant.

I wish I could finish tidying my desk instead of procrastinating it and posting this.

Granted. The desk is so tidy your computer and screen are gone. In fact, you are gone too. In fact, its so tidy, the whole universe is gone.

I wish i had a better memory of faces.

Granted. You will encounter people with disturbing facial features very often now.

I wish i had that thing on a rooster's head growing on my head.

Granted. But it grows on your tongue. Disgust intensifies.

I wish i had awesome facial hair.

Granted. It is awesome. So awesome that you suffocate in it!

I wish for the Earth to never stop existing.

Granted. New Horizon encounters signs of alien life beyond Pluto. Alien life discovers signs of sentient life further inwards to the sun. They metaphorically scratch their heads and start venturing inwards. They encounter earth, humanity... then the internet and cat memes. It is immediately decided to end it all there and now. Earth is now preserved perfectly in an unbreakable super-diamond casing. Kinda like an ancient fly in amber.

I wish I would be a bit better in playing MW:O.

Granted, everyone playing gets God-mode, rendering your skills useless.

I wish for infinite steak.

granted, but its all rotten

I wish Mr overfloater spaceplane sorcery worked again :c
Granted. The areodynamics system is reversed, as well as the patches being removed. KSP is back in .25, permanently.
I wish the user above me wished a wish.

Granted. But, i can't grant this wish, Because the person above you didn't make a wish, So this game was temporarily halted.

I wish I could go to Mimmus

(There's a 50 50 chance someone is going to say: "You made it, but your ship crashed on landing" Cmon, make it something special or different.

You made it, but your ship crashed while being subdued inside of minmus by Kraken.

I wish i had a better accent.

Granted. You meticulously plan your craft's layout, ascend profile, launch window, payload, and landing site. Calculating everything down to +/- 1m/s dv, energy requirements timed to arrive exactly at dawn on Minmus. You start. You fly, you land - rotating your single solar panel to get all the energy you need. By the time you return Squad released a new patch with a new aero, and your parachutes are now a tad bit too weak for a safe landing. The resulting crash manages to destroy your VAB. After payout and repair you have exactly 1 fund left. Time to start over.

I wish the cafeteria food I am about to get would be a bit more tasty.

Edit: ninja'd... ninjaed? ninj'ed? ninja-ed?

Granted. You now speak perfect oxford english. BBC would hire you on the spot as anchorman/-woman... unfortunately you now live in scotland. noone understands you.

I wish I knew how to properly spell "ninjae'd"(?)...

Edited July 29, 2015 by heng

Granted, but the ninja master who taught you will now ensure you take the secret to your grave... *Slash.* You've been [sPELLING REDACTED].

I wish I could focus more when I'm at work instead of browsing these forums.
